description: From a fractal set of positive Lebesgue measure, a self-replicating tiling with holes, the 4-reptile following the 2-reptile of Paul Levy.
comments: Counting filled equal triangles along lines on the Mandelvyn Triangle.
references: Melvyn J. Lafitte, Sur l'Effet Noa`h en Geometrie, rapport a l'INPI, Mars 1995.
Melvyn J. Lafitte, Ensembles Auto-Similaires d'Interieur Non-Vide, Preprint Hiver 1997, Chaire de Geometrie, Departement de Mathematiques, Ecole Polytechnique Federale de Lausanne, Switzerland.
Croft, Falconer and Guy, Unsolved Problems in Geometry, Springer-Verlag, 1991; Problem of least k such that there exists a non-simply-connected k-reptile.
author: Melvyn Jeremie Lafitte (mjlafitte(AT)gmail.com)
